Topic.Title: As Darkness Falls- problem with research

Posts.EditableText: Hi there.  I am writing this post relating to my game As Darkness Falls.  When I wrote it, play it and download it from this site  everything works fine.  But I see in the comments that someone else has hot got the right response when researching Columbus in the reference books.  There should be about 2 paragraphs of yellow text that holds the clue to the safe combination.  Has anyone else had this problem? Or has everyone else found it worked OK?
